Rules.ErrorMessage: One or more adjust rules failed, country : $(input4.country), loyalityFactor : $(input4.loyalityFactor), totalPurchasesToDate : $(input4.totalPurchasesToDate), totalOrders : $(input5.totalOrders), noOfVisitsPerMonth : $(input30.noOfVisitsPerMonth)
